short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes referrals and booking meetings a breeze! ⚡️

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connection Whiz is a chrome extension that allows business owners to quickly make referrals and book meetings via introductions. It connects entrepreneurs, marketers, and solution-seekers on a seamless, intuitive platform. 
Users can form powerful partnerships, leverage innovative strategies, and make and receive business referrals and introductions. 
Users can build their own private business referral networks, and also tap into other business referral networks around the world.
It’s like LinkedIn, only better. No bots or automation tools. No fake people or fake profiles. Just 100% genuinely supportive business people helping each other succeed by way of warm referrals and introductions.
